TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventInstance extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示事件日志项的非特定语言信息。

span.span: Represents language-neutral information for an event log entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用来写入事件日志条目使用的资源标识符，而不是一个字符串值。Use to write an event log entry with a resource identifier rather than a string value. 若要写入事件日志条目，初始化属性并将传递到实例方法。To write an event log entry, initialize the property and pass the instance to the method. 事件查看器使用实例标识符来查找并显示基于当前语言设置的本地化的资源文件中的相应字符串。The Event Viewer uses the instance identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings. 需要在编写使用资源标识符的事件前，必须将事件源注册相应的资源文件。You must register the event source with the corresponding resource file before you write events using resource identifiers. 写入事件时，你可以设置属性指定为该项的事件查看器显示的图标。When writing events, you can set the property to specify the icon that the Event Viewer displays for the entry. 你还可以指定属性指定为该项的事件查看器显示的类别。You can also specify a property to specify the category that the Event Viewer displays for the entry. 事件查看器将使用到按事件源写入筛选器事件类别。The Event Viewer uses the category to filter events written by an event source. 事件查看器可将类别显示为数字值，或者它可以作为资源标识符使用类别，以显示本地化的类别字符串。The Event Viewer can display the category as a numeric value, or it can use the category as a resource identifier to display a localized category string. 若要在事件查看器中显示本地化的类别字符串，必须使用事件源使用类别资源文件，配置和设置类别资源文件中的资源标识符。To display localized category strings in the Event Viewer, you must use an event source configured with a category resource file, and set the to a resource identifier in the category resource file. 如果事件源没有配置的类别资源文件，或指定不得索引类别资源文件，然后选择事件查看器中的字符串是否显示该条目的数字类别值。If the event source does not have a configured category resource file, or the specified does not index a string in the category resource file, and then the Event Viewer displays the numeric category value for that entry. 配置类别资源文件，以及数量的类别字符串在资源文件中，使用或类。Configure the category resource file, along with the number of category strings in the resource file, using the or the class. 你必须在使用之前注册为事件日志源要写入的事件方法。You must register a source for an event log before using to write an event with the method. 必须向日志写入本地化的项配置源和源必须定义至少一个消息资源文件。The source must be configured for writing localized entries to the log and the source must define at least a message resource file. 在你的应用程序的安装过程中创建新的事件源。Create the new event source during the installation of your application. 这样，可以为操作系统来刷新其已注册的事件源的列表和它们的配置的时间。This allows time for the operating system to refresh its list of registered event sources and their configurations. 如果操作系统未刷新其事件源的列表，并尝试写入新的源的事件写入操作将失败。If the operating system has not refreshed its list of event sources, and you attempt to write an event with the new source, the write operation will fail. 你可以配置新的源使用，或使用方法。You can configure a new source using an , or using the method. 若要创建新的事件源的计算机上，必须具有管理权限。You must have administrative rights on the computer to create a new event source. 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件日志资源文件的详细信息，请参阅处平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com)。For details about defining event messages and building event log resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个信息性事件的项，然后重用要向现有的事件日志写入一个警告事件的条目。The following code example writes an informational event entry, and then reuses the to write an entry for a warning event to an existing event log. 事件消息文本被指定的消息资源文件中使用的资源标识符。The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a message resource file. 代码示例假定已为源注册相应的消息资源文件。The code example assumes that the corresponding message resource file has been registered for the source. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#9)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#9)] 代码示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置于 EventLogMsgs.dll 的资源库。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

summary.span: 使用非特定语言的信息初始化 类的一个新实例以定义事件日志项。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using language-neutral information to define an event log entry.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int64 instanceId, int32 categoryId) cil managed
Public Sub New (instanceId As Long, categoryId As Integer)

param.name: instanceId
param.span: 资源标识符，与事件源的消息资源文件中定义的字符串对应。

span.span: A resource identifier that corresponds to a string defined in the message resource file of the event source.

param.name: categoryId
param.span: 资源标识符，与事件源的类别资源文件中定义的字符串对应。如果没有为事件指定类别，则为零。

span.span: A resource identifier that corresponds to a string defined in the category resource file of the event source, or zero to specify no category for the event.

summary.span: 使用事件项的本地化消息和类别文本的指定资源标识符初始化 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified resource identifiers for the localized message and category text of the event entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要向事件日志中写入信息条目，初始化和将其传递到方法。To write an informational entry to an event log, initialize an and pass it to the method. 设置`instanceId`到中相应的事件消息的资源标识符源的属性。Set the `instanceId` to the resource identifier of the event message in the corresponding property for the source. 设置`categoryId`为数值类别值或事件类别中的资源标识符源的属性; 设置`categoryId`为零没有事件类别。Set the `categoryId` to a numeric category value, or the resource identifier of the event category in the property for the source; set the `categoryId` to zero for no event category. 的新实例的属性设置为默认情况下。The property for the new instance is set to by default. 事件查看器使用的资源标识符来显示源的本地化的资源文件中的相应字符串。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifiers to display the corresponding strings from the localized resource files for the source. 你可以编写使用资源标识符的事件前，必须将源注册相应的资源文件。You must register the source with the corresponding resource files before you can write events using resource identifiers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个信息性事件的项，然后重用要向现有的事件日志写入一个警告事件的条目。The following code example writes an informational event entry, and then reuses the to write an entry for a warning event to an existing event log. 事件消息文本被指定的消息资源文件中使用的资源标识符。The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a message resource file. 代码示例假定已为源注册相应的消息资源文件。The code example assumes that the corresponding message resource file has been registered for the source. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#9)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#9)] 代码示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置于 EventLogMsgs.dll 的资源库。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

MemberSignature.Value: public EventInstance (long instanceId, int categoryId, System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType entryType);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int64 instanceId, int32 categoryId, valuetype System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType entryType) cil managed
Public Sub New (instanceId As Long, categoryId As Integer, entryType As EventLogEntryType)
public: EventInstance(long instanceId, int categoryId, System::Diagnostics::EventLogEntryType entryType);

param.name: instanceId
param.span: 资源标识符，与事件源的消息资源文件中定义的字符串对应。

span.span: A resource identifier that corresponds to a string defined in the message resource file of the event source.

param.name: categoryId
param.span: 资源标识符，与事件源的类别资源文件中定义的字符串对应。如果没有为事件指定类别，则为零。

span.span: A resource identifier that corresponds to a string defined in the category resource file of the event source, or zero to specify no category for the event.

param.name: entryType
param.span: 指示事件类型的 值。

span.span: An value that indicates the event type.

summary.span: 使用事件项的本地化消息和类别文本的指定资源标识符以及指定的事件日志项类型初始化 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified resource identifiers for the localized message and category text of the event entry and the specified event log entry type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要向事件日志中写入条目，初始化和将其传递到方法。To write an entry to an event log, initialize an and pass it to the method. 设置`instanceId`到中相应的事件消息的资源标识符源的属性。Set the `instanceId` to the resource identifier of the event message in the corresponding property for the source. 设置`categoryId`为数值类别值或事件类别中的资源标识符源的属性; 设置`categoryId`为零没有事件类别。Set the `categoryId` to a numeric category value, or the resource identifier of the event category in the property for the source; set the `categoryId` to zero for no event category. 事件查看器使用的资源标识符来显示源的本地化的资源文件中的相应字符串。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifiers to display the corresponding strings from the localized resource files for the source. 你可以编写使用资源标识符的事件前，必须将源注册相应的资源文件。You must register the source with the corresponding resource files before you can write events using resource identifiers. 设置`entryType`到预定义的条目类型之一。Set the `entryType` to one of the pre-defined entry types. 事件查看器使用的事件类型来确定要在事件日志的列表视图中显示的图标。The Event Viewer uses the event type to determine which icon to display in the list view of the event log. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个审核事件项写入事件日志`myNewLog`。The following code example writes two audit event entries to the event log `myNewLog`. 如果本地计算机上不存在，代码示例会创建一个新的事件源和新的事件日志。The code example creates a new event source and a new event log if they do not exist on the local computer. 事件消息文本被指定的资源文件中使用的资源标识符。The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a resource file. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#7)] 代码示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置于 EventLogMsgs.dll 的资源库。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CategoryId { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指定事件项的应用程序定义类别的资源标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the resource identifier that specifies the application-defined category of the event entry.

value.span: 数字型类别值或资源标识符，与事件源的类别资源文件中定义的字符串对应。

span.span: A numeric category value or resource identifier that corresponds to a string defined in the category resource file of the event source.

value.span: 默认值为零，这意味着将不会为该事件项显示类别。

span.span: The default is zero, which signifies that no category will be displayed for the event entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件日志类别是应用程序定义的值，用于帮助筛选事件，或进一步提供有关事件的信息。Event log categories are application-defined values that help filter events, or provide further information about the event. 例如，你的应用程序可以定义为不同的组件或不同的操作分隔不同类别。For example, your application can define separate categories for different components or different operations. 设置属性指定为该项的事件查看器显示的类别。Set the property to specify the category that the Event Viewer displays for the entry. 事件查看器可将类别显示为数字值，或者可以使用作为资源标识符来显示本地化的类别字符串基于当前语言设置。The Event Viewer can display the category as a numeric value, or it can use the as a resource identifier to display a localized category string based on the current language settings. 若要在事件查看器中显示本地化的类别字符串，必须使用事件源使用类别资源文件，配置和设置类别资源文件中的资源标识符。To display localized category strings in the Event Viewer, you must use an event source configured with a category resource file, and set the to a resource identifier in the category resource file. 如果事件源没有配置的类别资源文件，或指定不得索引类别资源文件，然后选择事件查看器中的字符串是否显示该条目的数字类别值。If the event source does not have a configured category resource file, or the specified does not index a string in the category resource file, and then the Event Viewer displays the numeric category value for that entry. 需要在编写使用资源标识符的事件类别前，必须将源注册相应的资源文件。You must register the source with the corresponding resource file before you write event categories using resource identifiers. 配置类别资源文件，以及数量的类别字符串在资源文件中，使用或类。Configure the category resource file, along with the number of category strings in the resource file, using the or the class. 当在资源文件中定义类别字符串，必须连续从 1 开始的最多配置编号类别资源标识符属性值。When defining category strings in a resource file, the category resource identifiers must be numbered consecutively starting at 1, up to the configured property value. 事件类别是可选的。Event categories are optional. 如果你的应用程序不使用类别，则不要设置事件日志条目。If your application does not use categories, do not set the for the event log entry. 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件资源文件的详细信息，请参阅处平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。有关在资源文件中定义的事件类别的详细信息，请参阅平台 SDK 中的"事件类别"主题For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). For details about defining event categories in resource files, see the "Event Categories" topic in the Platform SDK ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个信息性事件的项，然后重用要向现有的事件日志写入一个警告事件的条目。The following code example writes an informational event entry, and then reuses the to write an entry for a warning event to an existing event log. 事件消息文本被指定的消息资源文件中使用的资源标识符。The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a message resource file. 代码示例假定已为源注册相应的消息资源文件。The code example assumes that the corresponding message resource file has been registered for the source. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#9)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#9)] 代码示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置于 EventLogMsgs.dll 的资源库。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

exception.span: 该属性设置为负值或大于 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a negative value or to a value larger than .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Diagnostics::EventLogEntryType EntryType { System::Diagnostics::EventLogEntryType get(); void set(System::Diagnostics::EventLogEntryType value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置事件日志项的事件类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the event type of the event log entry.

value.span: 指示事件项类型的 值。

span.span: An value that indicates the event entry type.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个事件是应用程序将指示它在报告事件时的单一类型。Each event is of a single type, which the application indicates when it reports the event. 事件查看器使用的事件类型来确定要在事件日志的列表视图中显示的图标。The Event Viewer uses the event type to determine which icon to display in the list view of the event log. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个信息性事件的项，然后重用要向现有的事件日志写入一个警告事件的条目。The following code example writes an informational event entry, and then reuses the to write an entry for a warning event to an existing event log. 事件消息文本被指定的消息资源文件中使用的资源标识符。The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a message resource file. 代码示例假定已为源注册相应的消息资源文件。The code example assumes that the corresponding message resource file has been registered for the source. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#9)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#9)] 代码示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置于 EventLogMsgs.dll 的资源库。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```

exception.span: 该属性未设置为有效的 值。

span.span: The property is not set to a valid value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long InstanceId { long get(); void set(long value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指定事件项的消息文本的资源标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the resource identifier that designates the message text of the event entry.

value.span: 资源标识符，与事件源的消息资源文件中定义的字符串对应。

span.span: A resource identifier that corresponds to a string defined in the message resource file of the event source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性唯一地标识配置的事件源的事件条目。The property uniquely identifies an event entry for a configured event source. 在消息资源文件中定义的事件对应的消息文本文件中的消息定义字段从编译的资源标识符。For events defined in message resource files, the corresponds to the resource identifier compiled from the message definition fields in the message text file. 你的应用程序可以通过设置写入本地化的事件日志项的资源标识符。Your application can write localized event log entries by setting the to a resource identifier. 事件查看器使用资源标识符来查找并显示本地化的资源文件中的相应字符串基于当前语言设置。The Event Viewer uses the resource identifier to find and display the corresponding string from the localized resource file based on current language settings. 需要在编写使用资源标识符的事件前，必须将源注册相应的资源文件。You must register the source with the corresponding resource file before you write events using resource identifiers. 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件日志资源文件的详细信息，请参阅处平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。有关事件日志的标识符的详细信息，请参阅平台 SDK 中的"事件标识符"主题。For details about defining event messages and building event log resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). For details about event log identifiers, see the "Event Identifiers" topic in the Platform SDK. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个信息性事件的项，然后重用要向现有的事件日志写入一个警告事件的条目。The following code example writes an informational event entry, and then reuses the to write an entry for a warning event to an existing event log. 事件消息文本被指定的消息资源文件中使用的资源标识符。The event message text is specified using a resource identifier in a message resource file. 代码示例假定已为源注册相应的消息资源文件。The code example assumes that the corresponding message resource file has been registered for the source. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#9)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#9)] 代码示例使用下面的消息文本文件，内置于 EventLogMsgs.dll 的资源库。The code example uses the following message text file, built into the resource library EventLogMsgs.dll. 消息文本文件是从其创建的消息资源文件的源。A message text file is the source from which the message resource file is created. 消息文本文件定义的资源标识符和类别、 事件消息和参数插入字符串的文本。The message text file defines the resource identifiers and text for the category, event message, and parameter insertion strings. ``` ; // EventLogMsgs.mc ; // ******************************************************** ; // Use the following commands to build this file: ; // mc -s EventLogMsgs.mc ; // rc EventLogMsgs.rc ; // link /DLL /SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS /NOENTRY /MACHINE:x86 EventLogMsgs.Res ; // ******************************************************** ; // - Event categories - ; // Categories must be numbered consecutively starting at 1. ; // ******************************************************** MessageId=0x1 Severity=Success SymbolicName=INSTALL_CATEGORY Language=English Installation . MessageId=0x2 Severity=Success SymbolicName=QUERY_CATEGORY Language=English Database Query . MessageId=0x3 Severity=Success SymbolicName=REFRESH_CATEGORY Language=English Data Refresh . ; // - Event messages - ; // ********************************* MessageId = 1000 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_SUCCESS_MESSAGE_ID_1000 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1000, called from %1. . MessageId = 1001 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = AUDIT_FAILED_MESSAGE_ID_1001 Language=English My application message text, in English, for message id 1001, called from %1. . MessageId = 1002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_INFO_MESSAGE_ID_1002 Language=English My generic information message in English, for message id 1002. . MessageId = 1003 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = GENERIC_WARNING_MESSAGE_ID_1003 Language=English My generic warning message in English, for message id 1003, called from %1. . MessageId = 1004 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = UPDATE_CYCLE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE_ID_1004 Language=English The update cycle is complete for %%5002. . MessageId = 1005 Severity = Warning Facility = Application SymbolicName = SERVER_CONNECTION_DOWN_MESSAGE_ID_1005 Language=English The refresh operation did not complete because the connection to server %1 could not be established. . ; // - Event log display name - ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5001 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_DISPLAY_NAME_MSGID Language=English Sample Event Log . ; // - Event message parameters - ; // Language independent insertion strings ; // ******************************************************** MessageId = 5002 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = EVENT_LOG_SERVICE_NAME_MSGID Language=English SVC_UPDATE.EXE . ```
